local_intent: Perform controlled lowering to detect contact with red_plate, release white plate, and retreat.
assumptions: End-effector is positioned above red_plate before lowering
Gripper currently holds the white plate
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'place' phase from GLOBAL_BT: verify target, align, lower until contact, confirm contact, open gripper to release, and retreat to clear the placement area.
